author: jhm
msg: * use BuildListener for writing at the end of <junit> instead of overwriting the file all the time
* pass project reference to <junit> nested elements (eg listener)
* some log messages in the recorder
* can use Ant properties for setting the location
* don't set the project reference if there is already one
* use ant property instead of system property for configuring FailureRecorder

author: jm
msg: experiment; discard OSBF-style tokenization and just use simple SpamAssassin tokenization with the OSBF bigram format.  also set bayes_expiry_max_db_size=500000 temporarily -- this has been the case in all my recent tests (since about r584760), but I forgot to check it in...
